description:
Hi There

We're looking for someone who's worked with Parallax before to make some tweaks to an existing site to get the speed of the slides working slower and also ensure they don't overlay.

We also need you to ensure the site works across all browsers and sizes. You'll advise us on the best size for the background images so they work on larger browsers and ensure the copy resizes to fit on 1024 x 768.

We'll supply the details properly to candidates who have good parallax html 5 animation and javascript skills only so please only apply if you have a very high standard in these areas.
title: CSS 3 / Cross Browser Complaint Parallax Javascript Tweaks For Existing Site

assignments.comment: Dan gave me simple instructions, when I asked questions, he gave me precise answers to help me work better, hope to work with Dan again soon
assignments.title: Create three simple illustrations hand drawn line style to show accupressure positions

assignments.comment: Dan is one knowledgeable guy and I am so obliged working with him. I would definitely love to work with him on more exciting projects.
assignments.title: Kick Ass Web Designer to Re-design existing page
